title: Unfinished woman's blouse (Huipil)
description: Off-white ground with pairs of thin red stripes evenly spaced across width, wider stripes at side selvedge edges; intricate patterning in black, resembles European blackwork; birds, rayed diamonds, zigzags are the predominant design motifs; made of wool with some brightly colored silk accents, ie in the birds\' wings.
